metadata.title: CVE-2022-3176 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
There exists a use-after-free in io_uring in the Linux kernel.Signalfd_poll() and binder_poll() use a waitqueue whose lifetime is thecurrent task. It will send a POLLFREE notification to all waiters beforethe queue is freed. Unfortunately, the io_uring poll doesn't handlePOLLFREE. This allows a use-after-free to occur if a signalfd or binder fdis polled with io_uring poll, and the waitqueue gets freed. We recommendupgrading past commit fc78b2fc21f10c4c9c4d5d659a685710ffa63659

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
